bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Supreme lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, PressFit30 BB shell, High Direct Mount (HDM) front derailleur with internal cable routing, over-sized stays with post mount disc brakes & 12x142mm drop-out, stainless steel chain stay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox SID XX 650B, 15mm Maxle Lite, Motion Control damping, remote hydraulic Xloc lockout, External rebound, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
American Classic MTB Race tubeless, 15mm axle front & 12x142 rear hub, AC butted spokes & alloy nipples
Avid XX hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm front & 140mm rear HSX rotors
Ritchey WCS Riser carbon bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 15mm rise x 710mm
